LanguageData.ItchyCrotch.stages.0.label: itchy crotch
LanguageData.ItchyCrotch.stages.0.description: I don't think anyone's looking. Lemme just...
LanguageData.ItchyCrotch.stages.1.label: itchy, burning crotch
LanguageData.ItchyCrotch.stages.1.description: The worst part is: the more I scratch, the more it burns.
LanguageData.SyphiliticThoughts.stages.0.label: syphilitic thoughts
LanguageData.SyphiliticThoughts.stages.0.description: Everyone's so stupid and everything's so annoying. Even me, I just can't think clearly.
LanguageData.SyphiliticThoughts.stages.1.label: extreme syphilitic thoughts
LanguageData.SyphiliticThoughts.stages.1.description: OK, what I need is... uh... what was I doing again? Oh right this thing. This fucking thing THIS FUCKING PIECE OF SHIT. FUCKING DAMN PIECE OF GARBAGE
LanguageData.WastingAway.stages.0.label: wasting away
LanguageData.WastingAway.stages.0.description: Every day I feel weaker than the day before. I can feel my life slowly slipping away.
LanguageData.SawDiseasedPrivates1.stages.0.label: saw an ugly rash on {0}'s crotch
LanguageData.SawDiseasedPrivates2.stages.0.label: saw disgusting warts on {0}'s crotch
LanguageData.SawDiseasedPrivates3.stages.0.label: nauseated by {0}'s diseased crotch
